title: Top 10 trending phones of week 8
description: Week 8 brought two things to our trending chart - the end of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's reign that started at the beginning of the year and one of the most diverse trending charts in recent memory. It was the newly announced Apple iPhone 16e that immediately jumped to the top, while second place went to a phone that's not even going official for another 10 days. The Nothing Phone (3a) is clearly the most hotly anticipated debut at the MWC though. This meant the Galaxy S25 Ultra had to settle for third place. excerpt: A phone we did not expect to make the podium that early. Week 8 brought two things to our trending chart - the end of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's reign...
text: Week 8 brought two things to our trending chart - the end of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's reign that started at the beginning of the year and one of the most diverse trending charts in recent memory. It was the newly announced Apple iPhone 16e that immediately jumped to the top, while second place went to a phone that's not even going official for another 10 days. The Nothing Phone (3a) is clearly the most hotly anticipated debut at the MWC though. This meant the Galaxy S25 Ultra had to settle for third place. We do suspect it might still be able to fight back the new names once the dust settles. Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales. 256GB 12GB RAM$ 1,169.00$ 1,299.99512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,276.11$ 1,299.99Show all prices In fourth we find the Galaxy A55, while fifth went to the Poco X7 Pro. It was closely followed by the other new announcement of the week - the vivo V50. Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max sits in sixth, just edging the Galaxy S25, which lost four more spots this week. Two more new faces complete the chart - the Realme P3 Pro managed to grab ninth, while the Nothing Phone (3a) Pro captured the last spot.
html:
Week 8 brought two things to our trending chart - the end of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra's reign that started at the beginning of the year and one of the most diverse trending charts in recent memory.

It was the newly announced Apple iPhone 16e that immediately jumped to the top, while second place went to a phone that's not even going official for another 10 days. The Nothing Phone (3a) is clearly the most hotly anticipated debut at the MWC though.

This meant the Galaxy S25 Ultra had to settle for third place. We do suspect it might still be able to fight back the new names once the dust settles.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 12GB RAM$ 1,169.00$ 1,299.99
512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,276.11$ 1,299.99
Show all prices

In fourth we find the Galaxy A55, while fifth went to the Poco X7 Pro. It was closely followed by the other new announcement of the week - the vivo V50.

Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max sits in sixth, just edging the Galaxy S25, which lost four more spots this week.

Two more new faces complete the chart - the Realme P3 Pro managed to grab ninth, while the Nothing Phone (3a) Pro captured the last spot.
